subject: Just the chamber and speaker
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
The small hole is for the mic. At 7 seconds "smoking and you stay right
here". Smoke for 35 years and even after five or six or whatever it's been
years of not smoking, it still crosses my mind from time to time, and this
is the imediate response.

 F-S
